entry.title: BIP: Using Median time-past as endpoint for locktime calculations
entry.summary: A user has submitted a pull-request for the median-past timelock BIP on GitHub. They inquire about finding a link to this discussion and Peter Todd responds that Gregory Maxwell should receive credit for the actual idea in question. Mark Friedenbach is acknowledged for designing and authoring the reference implementation of this BIP, while Thomas Kerin authored the BIP document. The email also includes a PGP signature.
